stories.content: Hey, don't be panic and get a deep breath, you're safe... for now. Let me get this straight, you're in a endless nightmare, you have to make a lot of choices to move on, then you can get away from this, so... good luck. If you're ready for this, open the left door.

Well, You don't know me, don't you?

L: Yes/R: No

Alright, my name is Robert, I have two daughters and a wife, one day in the lovely sunday afternoon, I killed them.

Do you think I am crazy?

L: Yes/R: No

Yes, I'm not crazy.

It's a number, it messed up my head, 204xxx... is this number even or odd?

L: Even/R: Odd

Ah... it's odd. I knew it mean something, but it's too late to figure it out before I dead. I hung myself in the...?

L: Garage/R: Fridge

Oh, yes, it's bored, right? Garage? There are plenty of place to die than garage, but I do hung myself up with a garden hose.

L: Okay/R: Hmm

I was a terrible dad, my daughter hates me. But guess what? She died, so no one hates no one.

THE END. 

Hmm... nice story, huh?

L: Yes/R: No

Yeah... it's not. Well, good for you to reach here. So ready for a new adventure with my daughter?

L: Of course/R: Seriously?

Nah, just kidding. She still needs a while to come back from hell. Oh wait, I think maybe you've met my wife Lisa many times...

Never mind, just leave.
